Welcome to franckcondon's documentation!
========================================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

Calculations
============

Calculations are performed using the **MultiModeFC** class:

.. autoclass:: franckcondon.MultiModeFC
	:members:

Fitting
=======
	
Fitting is performed using the **MultiModeFCFitting** class:

.. autoclass:: franckcondon.MultiModeFCFitting
	:inherited-members:
	:members:
